alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 3:05PM EDT until August 16 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 305 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomasville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Quitman, Boston, Fincher, Dixie, Dills, Grooverville, Everett, Eason, Pidcock, Jarrott, Brooks Co A/p, Newark, Ashville and Metcalf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
